p: Some of this will be destabilizing for sure, but the urgency of resolving the staggering scale of the ecological crisis and advancing justice and rights demands new theory and praxis this decade, as climate scientists tell us, or it will be too late to avoid catastrophic planetary warming. It is a daunting challenge—perhaps unprecedented in human history. But is there another option?
